types.name: short int
types.description: Signed 16 bit integer

types.name: unsigned short int
types.description: Unsigned 16 bit integer

types.name: int
types.description: Signed 16/32 bit integer

types.name: unsigned int
types.description: Unsigned 16/32 bit integer

types.name: long int
types.description: Signed 32 bit integer

types.name: unsigned long int
types.description: Unsigned 32 bit integer

types.name: long long int
types.description: Signed 64 bit integer

types.name: unsigned long long int
types.description: Unsigned 64 bit integer

types.name: char
types.description: Smallest addressable unit

types.name: signed char
types.description: Guaranteed to be a signed char

types.name: unsigned char
types.description: Guaranteed to be an unsigned char

types.name: float
types.description: Floating-point format

types.name: double
types.description: Double precision floating-point format

types.name: long double
types.description: Quadruple precision floating-point format

types.name: size_t
types.description: Used whenever measuring the size of something.

types.name: bool
types.description: Used to represent true or false

types.name: intmax_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the largest possible signed integer.

types.name: uintmax_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the largest possible unsigned integer.

types.name: int8_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> guarantees exactly 8 bits.

types.name: int16_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> guarantees exactly 16 bits.

types.name: int32_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> guarantees exactly 32 bits.

types.name: int64_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> guarantees exactly 64 bits.

types.name: uint8_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> guarantees exactly 8 bits.

types.name: uint16_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> guarantees exactly 16 bits.

types.name: uint32_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> guarantees exactly 32 bits.

types.name: uint64_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> guarantees exactly 64 bits.

types.name: int_least8_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is at least 8 bits.

types.name: int_least16_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is at least 16 bits.

types.name: int_least32_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is at least 32 bits.

types.name: int_least64_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is at least 64 bits.

types.name: uint_least8_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is at least 8 bits.

types.name: uint_least16_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is at least 16 bits.

types.name: uint_least32_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is at least 32 bits.

types.name: uint_least64_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is at least 64 bits.

types.name: int_fast8_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the fastest access integer for current processor with at least 8 bits.

types.name: int_fast16_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the fastest access integer for current processor with at least 16 bits.

types.name: int_fast32_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the fastest access integer for current processor with at least 32 bits.

types.name: int_fast64_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the fastest access integer for current processor with at least 64 bits.

types.name: uint_fast8_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the fastest access unsigned integer for current processor with at least 8 bits.

types.name: uint_fast16_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the fastest access unsigned integer for current processor with at least 16 bits.

types.name: uint_fast32_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the fastest access unsigned integer for current processor with at least 32 bits.

types.name: uint_fast64_t
types.description: Defined in <stdint.h> it is the fastest access unsigned integer for current processor with at least 64 bits.
